column9:
$ open / use / go / take / go in / leave
breakIf(>locked, enabled)
move(>ANY orientation)
column10:
$ unlock
breakIf(>locked, disabled)
breakIf(!p key>doorID, not same, >doorID)
disable(>locked)
write(the door is now unlocked)

column6:
$ open / use / go / take / go in / leave
move(>interior)

contents
fresh food:5
fresh food:2*10%
kitchen misc:2*10%
closet food:3*5%
radio:1*5%

column9:
$ look
describe(! interior.parent)
%
describe([{! parent>tileset} >interior coords])
column10:
$ climb / move / enter
describe(! interior.parent)
%
set(#current tile, [{! parent>tileset} >interior coords])
set(! player>tileset, ! parent>tileset)
set(! player>coords, >interior coords)
set(! player>hourRate, 10)
set(#interior, this)
set(! player>orientation, east)
describe(_TILE)

column6:
contents
fresh food: 10 * 10%
vegetable: 10 * 10%

beverage: 3 * 20%
